question: What is Vue.js?
options: A JavaScript framework for building user interfaces

To bind a class to an element

question: Which Vue.js lifecycle hook is called before the component is inserted into the DOM?

options: Include them directly in the template

question: In Vue.js, what is the purpose of the filters?
options: To format text in the template

options: To set a timeout for a function
To schedule a callback function after the next DOM update
To delay the execution of a function

question: What is the purpose of the v-pre directive in Vue.js?
options: To prevent a block of text from being compiled
To preload images in the template

question: Which of the following is a Vue.js router hook?

options: To share data between parent and child components without using props

options: To limit the scope of a style to a specific component
To override styles from parent components

options: To define a placeholder for content that will be inserted by the parent component

options: To perform cleanup when a component is deactivated
To perform an action after a component has been inserted into the DOM

question: Which Vue.js feature is used for state management in large applications?

options: To prevent components from being destroyed
To persist state across route changes

options: To create animated transitions between elements

To define a placeholder for content
